name: reactions_delete-for-team-discussion-comment
description:
**Note:** You can also specify a team or organization with `team_id` and `org_id` using the route `DELETE /organizations/:org_id/team/:team_id/discussions/:discussion_number/comments/:comment_number/reactions/:reaction_id`.

Delete a reaction to a [team discussion comment](https://docs.github.com/rest/reference/teams#discussion-comments). OAuth access tokens require the `write:discussion` [scope](https://docs.github.com/apps/building-oauth-apps/understanding-scopes-for-oauth-apps/).

org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

team_slug.description: The slug of the team name.

discussion_number.description: The number that identifies the discussion.

comment_number.description: The number that identifies the comment.

reaction_id.description: The unique identifier of the reaction.
